entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Summerland
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 9.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Summerland 3:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 9.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.9 kPa falling
Humidity: 38 %
Dewpoint: -4.7°C
Wind: NW 22 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers overnight. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries beginning in the morning. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Friday 27 January 2023
